sentence: The war cry for justice was all over - Much to the chagrin of the authorities.
Catalan: El crit de guerra per la justícia va ser tot el que va acabar amb el chagrin de les autoritats.
backtrans: The cry of war for justice was all that ended with the Chagrin of the authorities.

sentence: The regime's decision adumbrates the underlying agenda.
Catalan: La decisió del règim adumbates l'agenda subjacent.
backtrans: The decision of the Adumbates regime the underlying agenda.

sentence: The community was anxious over the passing of the much needed reforms.
Catalan: La comunitat estava ansiosa sobre el pas de les reformes molt necessàries.
backtrans: The community was anxious about the passage of the necessary reforms.

sentence: The think tank  published a paper outlining their apology of capital punishment.
Catalan: El Think Tank va publicar un article que descriu la seva disculpa de la pena de mort.
backtrans: The Think Tank published an article that describes his apology from the death penalty.

sentence: Aught was left of the petition's validity
Catalan: Es va deixar la validesa de la petició
backtrans: The validity of the request was left

sentence: The President exhorted his ministers to buckle up as key opposition support for his economic plan was about to buckle.
Catalan: El president va exhortar els seus ministres per sivilitzar-se com a suport clau de l'oposició al seu pla econòmic estava a punt de sivella.
backtrans: The president exhorted his ministers to sivilise as key support for the opposition to his economic plan was about buckle.

sentence: The voters were chuffed to see the bill passed.
Catalan: Els votants estaven paralitzats per veure que el projecte de llei va passar.
backtrans: Voters were paralyzed to see that the bill passed.

sentence: The lawyer's discursive narration swayed the jury.
Catalan: La narració discursiva de l'advocat es va balancejar el jurat.
backtrans: The discursive narration of the lawyer swept the jury.

Catalan: El tribunal va ordenar la violència!

sentence: The EU block opposed an eventual imposition of anti-dumping measures.
Catalan: El bloc de la UE es va oposar a una eventual imposició de mesures anti-dumping.
backtrans: The EU block opposed an eventual imposition of anti-dumping measures.

sentence: A fulsome eulogy was delivered by the sly counsel.
Catalan: El Consell d'Eulogia fuls va ser lliurat.
backtrans: The Council of Eulogy Fuls was delivered.

sentence: The gig-economy agency decided to garnish the refunds!
Catalan: L'Agència de Gig Economia va decidir decorar les devolucions!
backtrans: The agency of Gig Economy decided to decorate the returns!

sentence: Members of the anti-theocratic revolutionary movement overthrew the peers in power!
Catalan: Els membres del moviment revolucionari antiocràtic van derrocar als companys al poder!
backtrans: The members of the Antiocratic Revolutionary Movement demolished colleagues in power!

sentence: The traitors disappointingly decided to fight with the colonialists.
Catalan: Els traïdors deceben de decebre lluitar amb els colonialistes.
backtrans: The traitors disappear from writing with colonialists.
